title: Court to indict accused in protest cases against PTI founder, Qureshi
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 23 (APP):An Anti-Terrorism Court (ATC) on Wednesday ordered to provide the copies of challan to the present accused in protest cases registered against PTI founder, Shah Mehmood Qureshi and others.
Judge Tahir Abbas Sapra heard the aforesaid case. During the hearing yesterday, the court summoned the accused who appeared and distributed copies of the challans to them, while issuing arrest warrants for the absent accused, saying that the accused will be indicted in the next hearing of the case.
The court adjourned the hearing of both the cases till July 30. Two cases are registered against PTI founder Shah Mehmood Qureshi and others in Khanna police station.
